isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 10 SPEED AND 15 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT, RTO, AND RTX SERIES - INSTALL - SLAVE VALVE

step1.para: If previously removed, install the air line fittings on the slave valve ( Figure 2966).

figure.caption: Figure 296. Install Air Line Fittings on Slave Valve

step1.para: Install the spring on the shank of the actuating pin and insert in the bore of the transmission case ( Figure 297).

figure.caption: Figure 297. Install Spring on Shank of Actuating Pin

step1.para: Install the hat-type alignment sleeve in the bore of the slave valve ( Figure 298).

figure.caption: Figure 298. Install Hat-Type Alignment Sleeve in Slave Valve Bore

step1.para: Position the gasket on the valve mounting surface and install the slave valve on the case, inserting the end of the actuating pin into the alignment sleeve ( Figure 299). Secure the valve to case with the four bolts. Apply Loctite 242 to the bolt threads and tighten evenly to 8 to 12 ft-lbs. (11 to 16 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 299. Install Slave Valve on Case
